ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle ginger ale
des: "Too busy to cook? Well, just put these four ingredients in the oven and forget about it. I like to use London broil. Great served over noodles! Try adding your favorite vegetables."
ins:
Preheat oven to 200 degrees F (95 degrees C).
Cut the roast into cubes, then place in a 10x15 inch roasting pan with soup mix, ginger ale and mushrooms; mix well.
Bake in preheated oven for 4 hours.
